bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Functional Specification of Fixed Transmission Series Capacitor Banks for Transmission System Applications
IEEE Draft Guide for the Functional Specification of Fixed Transmission Series Capacitor Banks for Transmission System Applications

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This Guide provides general guidelines toward the preparations of a functional specification of transmission fixed series capacitor banks (FSC) using overvoltage protection based on three technologies: * metal oxide varistors * metal oxide varistors with a forced triggered bypass gaps, and thyristor protected series capacitors. * thyristor protected series capacitor.This Guide does not apply comprehensively to Thyristor Controlled Series Capacitors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
